greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Iterated sum-of-digits of A078403(n).
link: Cino Hilliard, Proof of the Digital Root Theorem, posted on Yahoo group B2LCC, Feb 17 2003
program: (PARI) drp(n) = { forprime(x=2,n, r = x%9; if(isprime(r), print1(r" "); ); ); }
results.author: _Cino Hilliard_, Dec 24 2002
